name: BetterInputs
description: Makes inputs behave like they should.

allow-any-character.name: Allow any character
allow-any-character.description: Allows inputting any character (even ones not allowed) into input nodes.

bypass-length-check.name: Bypass Length Check
bypass-length-check.description: Allows inserting however many characters into an input node.

alternate-cursor-blink.name: Alternate Cursor blink
alternate-cursor-blink.description: Alternate cursor blinking animation, similar to VSCode.

alternate-deselect.name: Alternate Deselect
alternate-deselect.description: Makes the ESC key functions just like in the base game, doesn't deselect the input and instead just exits/closes the layer.

highlight-color.name: Selection Color
highlight-color.description: Sets the color of the highlight.
